name: smart-review-api
description: Cloudflare Workers API for Smart Review App

scripts.cleanup:r2: node -e "require('fs').readFileSync('.dev.vars', 'utf-8').split('\n').forEach(line => { const match = line.match(/^([^=]+)=(.*)$/); if (match) process.env[match[1]] = match[2]; });" && node scripts/cleanup-r2.js
scripts.cleanup:r2:execute: node -e "require('fs').readFileSync('.dev.vars', 'utf-8').split('\n').forEach(line => { const match = line.match(/^([^=]+)=(.*)$/); if (match) process.env[match[1]] = match[2]; });" && node scripts/cleanup-r2.js --cleanup
